\[%mdk-data-line={17}
\begin{aligned}
x &= \alpha+\beta f+\varepsilon  \\ 
E(\varepsilon) &= 0\\ 
E(f)&= 0\\ 
 cov(f,\varepsilon)&=0 \\ 
 cov(\varepsilon,\varepsilon)&= D,D=(\sigma_1^2,\cdots ,\sigma_1^N)I_N\\ 
 D&= diag(\sigma_1^2,\cdots ,\sigma_1^N)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
